question: Which place has been selected as the leading sports tourism destination of world?
explanation: Abu Dhabi is selected as the world\'s leading Sports tourism Destination for the seventh consecutive time. The decision was made at the 26th edition of the World Travel Awards (WTA) that is being held in Muscat, Oman. Abu Dhabi stands as a premium destination for sports tourism in 2019. It hosted some of the world\'s top sporting events, such as the Federation Internationale de Football Association (FIFA) Club World Cup 2017 and 2018, the AFC Asian Cup 2019, the Special Olympics World Games 2019, the 1st edition of the UAE Tour, and the Brazil vs South Korea international friendly match.
